00019 static const char Usage[] =
00020 "\n"
00021 "\n"
00022 "Usage: orcaroot [options] [input file(s) / socket host:port]\n"
00023 "\n"
00024 "The one required argument is either the name of a file to be processed or\n"
00025 "a host and port of a socket from which to read data. For a file, you may\n"
00026 "enter a series of files to be processed, or use a wildcard like \"file*.dat\"\n"
00027 "For a socket, the argument should be formatted as host:port.\n"
00028 "\n"
00029 "Available options:\n"
00030 "  --help : print this message and exit\n"
00031 "  --verbosity [verbosity] : set the severity/verbosity for the logger.\n"
00032 "    Choices are: debug, trace, routine, warning, error, and fatal.\n"
00033 "  --label [label] : use [label] as prefix for root output file name.\n"
00034 "\n"
00035 "Example usage:\n"
00036 "orcaroot run194ecpu\n"
00037 "  Rootify local file run194ecpu with default verbosity, output file label, etc.\n"
00038 "orcaroot run*\n"
00039 "  Same as before, but run over all files beginning with \"run\".\n"
00040 "orcaroot --verbosity debug --label mylabel run194ecpu\n"
00041 "  The same, but with example usage of the verbosity and mylabel options.\n"
00042 "  An output file will be created with name mylabel_run194.root, and lots\n"
00043 "  of debugging output will appear.\n"
00044 "orcaroot 128.95.100.213:44666\n"
00045 "  Rootify orca stream on host 128.95.100.213, port 44666 with default verbosity,\n"
00046 "  output file label, etc.\n"
00047 "\n"
00048 "\n";
00049 
00050 
00051 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00052 {
00053   if(argc == 1) {
00054     ORLog(kError) << "You must supply some options" << endl << Usage;
00055     return 1;
00056   }
00057 
00058 
00059   static struct option longOptions[] = {
00060     {"help", no_argument, 0, 'h'},
00061     {"verbosity", required_argument, 0, 'v'},
00062     {"label", required_argument, 0, 'l'},
00063   };
00064 
00065   string label = "OR";
00066   ORVReader* reader = NULL;
00067 
00068   while(1) {
00069     char optId = getopt_long(argc, argv, "", longOptions, NULL);
00070     if(optId == -1) break;
00071     switch(optId) {
00072       case('h'): // help
00073         cout << Usage;
00074         return 0;
00075       case('v'): // verbosity
00076         if(strcmp(optarg, "debug") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kDebug);
00077         else if(strcmp(optarg, "trace") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kTrace);
00078         else if(strcmp(optarg, "routine") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kRoutine);
00079         else if(strcmp(optarg, "warning") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kWarning);
00080         else if(strcmp(optarg, "error") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kError);
00081         else if(strcmp(optarg, "fatal") == 0) ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kFatal);
00082         else {
00083           ORLog(kWarning) << "Unknown verbosity setting " << optarg 
00084                           << "; using kRoutine" << endl;
00085           ORLogger::SetSeverity(ORLogger::kRoutine);
00086         }
00087         break;
00088       case('l'): // label
00089         label = optarg;
00090         break;
00091       default: // unrecognized option
00092         ORLog(kError) << Usage;
00093         return 1;
00094     }
00095   }
00096 
00097   if (argc <= optind) {
00098     ORLog(kError) << "You must supply a filename or socket host:port" << endl
00099                   << Usage << endl;
00100     return 1;
00101   }
00102 
00103   string readerArg = argv[optind];
00104   size_t iColon = readerArg.find(":");
00105   if (iColon == string::npos) {
00106     reader = new ORFileReader;
00107     for (int i=optind; i<argc; i++) {
00108       ((ORFileReader*) reader)->AddFileToProcess(argv[i]);
00109     }
00110   } else {
00111     reader = new ORSocketReader(readerArg.substr(0, iColon).c_str(), 
00112                                 atoi(readerArg.substr(iColon+1).c_str()));
00113   }
00114 
00115   if (!reader->OKToRead()) {
00116     ORLog(kError) << "Reader couldn't read" << endl;
00117     return 1;
00118   }
00119 
00120   ORLog(kRoutine) << "Setting up data processing manager..." << endl;
00121   ORDataProcManager dataProcManager(reader);
00122   ORLog(kRoutine) << "Opening output file..." << endl;
00123 
00124   ORFileWriter fileWriter(label);
00125   dataProcManager.AddProcessor(&fileWriter);
00126 
00127   ORAD811ADCDecoder camac811ADCDecoder;
00128   ORBasicTreeWriter camac811ADCTreeWriter(&camac811ADCDecoder, "Camac811ADCTree");
00129   dataProcManager.AddProcessor(&camac811ADCTreeWriter);
00130 
00131   ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter scalersTreeWriter("ScalersTree");
00132   dataProcManager.AddProcessor(&scalersTreeWriter);
00133 
00134 //   ORAD413ADCDecoder camac413ADCDecoder;
00135 //   ORBasicTreeWriter camac413ADCTreeWriter(&camac413ADCDecoder, "Camac413ADCTree");
00136 //   dataProcManager.AddProcessor(&camac413ADCTreeWriter);
00137 
00138   ORLog(kRoutine) << "Start processing..." << endl;
00139   dataProcManager.ProcessDataStream();
00140   ORLog(kRoutine) << "Finished processing..." << endl;
00141 
00142   delete reader;
00143 
00144   return 0;
00145 }
